title: Coco
description: A musical game to teach kids about the importance of family, by keeping Coco's memory alive.
author: Diana LÃ³pez
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5T_KlJEggbY

content.caption: Children walk with their parents through the corridor watch the view of the festival.
Users cross the flower bridge to see the light show.
Stand on the button to start.
Megial tells users the rules of game.
Users choose the musical instrument to play.
Follow the music to play the game.
Keep playing to keep the memories alive.
Follow the music to finish the game and win.
